vocabulary.definition: having a subtle difference or distinction
vocabulary.example: She has a nuanced understanding of different cultures.
Water is essential for human survival.

vocabulary.definition: a word naming an attribute of a noun
vocabulary.example: In the sentence 'the red car', 'red' is an adjective describing the car.

vocabulary.definition: a person who has changed their beliefs or way of living
vocabulary.example: After traveling to India, she became a convert to yoga.

vocabulary.definition: one of two or more available possibilities
vocabulary.example: He offered an alternative solution to the problem.
